0.text: Basic Attack: Jhin fires at the target with  Whisper, dealing 100% AD physical damage and applying  on-hit and on-attack effects.
0.html: Basic Attack: Jhin fires at the target with Whisper, dealing 100% AD physical damage and applying on-hit and on-attack effects.

1.text: Jhin's basic attacks can  critically strike and these attacks have slightly increased missile speed, but only deal 「 (150.5% +  30.1%) AD physical damage. 」「 86% of the  critical damage champions usually have. 」
1.html: Jhin's basic attacks can critically strike and these attacks have slightly increased missile speed, but only deal 「 (150.5% +  30.1%) AD physical damage. 」「 86% of the  critical damage champions usually have. 」

2.text: Jhin's attack speed cannot be improved at all except through growth.
2.html: Jhin's attack speed cannot be improved at all except through growth.

0.text: Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition within 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being out of combat and not being affected by  crowd control. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
0.html: Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition within 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being out of combat and not being affected by crowd control. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

1.text: Jhin's final round attack has an  uncancellable windup versus champions, always  critically strikes its target, including  structures, and also deals 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) of the target's  missing health as bonus physical damage to non-structures.
1.html: Jhin's final round attack has an uncancellable windup versus champions, always critically strikes its target, including structures, and also deals 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) of the target's  missing health as bonus physical damage to non-structures.

2.text: Innate - Every Moment Matters: Jhin gains 4% − 44% (based on level)「 (+ 0.3% per 1% critical strike chance) (+ 0.25% per 1% bonus attack speed) 」「 (+ 30% of his critical strike chance) (+ 25% of his bonus attack speed) 」 AD as  bonus attack damage.
2.html: Innate - Every Moment Matters: Jhin gains 4% − 44% (based on level)「 (+ 0.3% per 1% critical strike chance) (+ 0.25% per 1% bonus attack speed) 」「 (+ 30% of his critical strike chance) (+ 25% of his bonus attack speed) 」 AD as  bonus attack damage.

3.text: Additionally,  critical strikes grant Jhin 10% (+ 0.4% per 1% bonus attack speed)  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
3.html: Additionally, critical strikes grant Jhin 10% (+ 0.4% per 1% bonus attack speed)  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Jhin throws a grenade at the target enemy that can bounce to up to three additional nearby enemies, dealing physical damage to each target.
0.html: Active: Jhin throws a grenade at the target enemy that can bounce to up to three additional nearby enemies, dealing physical damage to each target.

1.text: The damage is increased by 35% of the base damage if the enemy the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
1.html: The damage is increased by 35% of the base damage if the enemy the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.

0.text: Passive: Enemy  champions that trigger a  Lotus Trap to bloom or are damaged by Jhin or allied champions are marked for 4 seconds.
0.html: Passive: Enemy champions that trigger a Lotus Trap to bloom or are damaged by Jhin or allied champions are marked for 4 seconds.

1.text: Active: Jhin fires a shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against  minions.
1.html: Active: Jhin fires a shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against minions.

2.text: Hitting a marked champion  roots them for a duration and grants Jhin  Every Moment Matters'  bonus movement speed.
2.html: Hitting a marked champion roots them for a duration and grants Jhin Every Moment Matters'  bonus movement speed.

0.text: Passive - Beauty in Death: Whenever Jhin kills an enemy champion, he summons a Blooming Lotus Trap on their corpse.
0.html: Passive - Beauty in Death: Whenever Jhin kills an enemy champion, he summons a Blooming Lotus Trap on their corpse.

1.text: Active: Jhin places a Lotus Trap at the target location which, upon landing, becomes  stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting  sight within its radius. The Lotus Trap blooms upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming  revealed for 4 seconds.
1.html: Active: Jhin places a Lotus Trap at the target location which, upon landing, becomes stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The Lotus Trap blooms upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming revealed for 4 seconds.

2.text: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.
2.html: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.

3.text: Blooming Lotus Traps  slow enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before exploding, dealing magic damage to enemies. Lotus Traps deal 65% damage against  minions as well as  champions who have been struck by another Lotus Trap in the last 1 second.
3.html: Blooming Lotus Traps slow enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before exploding, dealing magic damage to enemies. Lotus Traps deal 65% damage against minions as well as champions who have been struck by another Lotus Trap in the last 1 second.

4.text: See Pets for more details about Lotus Traps.
4.html: See Pets for more details about Lotus Traps.

0.text: Active: Jhin  channels for up to 10 seconds, gaining the ability to recast Curtain Call 4 times within the duration.
0.html: Active: Jhin channels for up to 10 seconds, gaining the ability to recast Curtain Call 4 times within the duration.

1.text: Recast: After 0.25 seconds, Jhin fires a round in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory for 0.5 seconds and deals physical damage to enemies hit, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health). It will stop upon hitting an enemy  champion,  slowing them by 80% for 0.5 seconds and  revealing them for 2 seconds. Each cast has a static cooldown of 1 second.
1.html: Recast: After 0.25 seconds, Jhin fires a round in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory for 0.5 seconds and deals physical damage to enemies hit, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health). It will stop upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing them by 80% for 0.5 seconds and revealing them for 2 seconds. Each cast has a static cooldown of 1 second.

2.text: The fourth shot  critically strikes for (100% +  35%) bonus physical damage.
2.html: The fourth shot critically strikes for (100% +  35%) bonus physical damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
